item.title: 戴尔与埃隆-马斯克的 xAI 公司达成 50 亿美元人工智能服务器交易
item.description: 戴尔科技公司（Dell Technologies Inc. ）已进入后期阶段，将达成一项价值超过 50 亿美元的交易，为埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 xAI 公司提供专为人工智能工作优化的服务器。【原文：Dell Technologies Inc. is in advanced stages of securing a deal worth more than $5 billion to provide Elon Musk’s xAI with servers optimized for artificial intelligence work.】

item.title: 美国商品期货交易委员会（CFTC）举报人主管被任命为该机构最高执法监察官
item.description: 商品期货交易委员会周五宣布，该机构的最高执法职位将由监管机构举报人办公室前主任布莱恩-杨（Brian Young）接任。【原文：The Commodity Futures Trading Commission’s top enforcement job will go to Brian Young, the former head of the regulator’s whistleblower office, the agency announced Friday.】

item.title: 电子游戏制作人在拉斯维加斯寻找希望
item.description:
在一年一度的 DICE 大会上，游戏制造商们表示，复苏之路仍显得 漫长

。【原文：

At the annual DICE convention, game makers said the road to recovery still appears lengthy

】

item.title: 研究人员称间谍组织正瞄准无人机技术制造商
item.description: 嗨，我是约旦。一家安全公司警告说 网络间谍正试图窃取 无人机技术制造商的数据但首先...【原文：Hi, it’s Jordan. A security firm warns that cyber spies are trying to pilfer data from makers of drone technology. But first…】

item.title: Agnico 接近全球第二大黄金矿商的产量目标
item.description: 阿尼科-伊格尔矿业公司（Agnico Eagle Mines Ltd. ）有可能从其主要竞争对手手中夺走世界第二大黄金生产商的头衔。【原文：Agnico Eagle Mines Ltd. is threatening to snag the title of world’s second-largest gold producer from one of its top rivals.】

item.title: 优步的欧洲竞争对手 Bolt 将在加拿大推出共享汽车服务
item.description: 优步（Uber Technologies Inc. ）的竞争对手、总部位于爱沙尼亚的 Bolt Technology OU 公司正在招募司机，准备在加拿大主要城市推出叫车服务，这是该公司近期进军北美市场的又一举措。【原文：Bolt Technology OU, the Estonia-based rival to Uber Technologies Inc., is recruiting drivers ahead of launching ridehailing services in major Canadian cities, extending a recent push into the North American market.】

item.title: Talk Tuah "播客令人难以置信的兴衰史
item.description:
2024年第四季度，哈利 韦尔奇的节目在全美排名第11

。【原文：

During the fourth quarter of 2024, Haliey Welch’s show ranked No. 11 in the entire US

】

item.title: 英国立法者 "关注 "医院扣留病人问题
item.description: 在彭博新闻社的一项调查之后，一位有影响力的英国立法者对该国投资于拘留病人的营利性医院提出了担忧，她认为这是 "令人不安的模式 "调查结果的一部分。【原文：An influential UK lawmaker has raised concerns about the country’s investment in for-profit hospitals that detain patients, following a Bloomberg News investigation she described as part of a “disturbing pattern” of findings.】

item.title: 房利美将 7.52 亿美元的预留部分归咎于多户住宅欺诈者
item.description: 房利美（Fannie Mae）为其公寓大楼贷款业务的信贷损失预留了 7.52 亿美元，部分原因是欺诈或涉嫌欺诈，在全行业对借款人进行严格审查的情况下，利润受到了影响。【原文：Fannie Mae set aside $752 million for credit losses in its apartment complex lending business in part because of fraud or suspected fraud, denting profits amid an industrywide scrutiny of borrowers.】

item.title: 历史悠久的秘鲁高管重回加拿大铜业初创公司
item.description: 维克多-戈比茨（Victor Gobitz）在管理秘鲁最大的几个矿山数十年后，重新成为一家加拿大初创公司的掌舵人，该公司计划在一年内开始铜矿生产，并在中期内上市。【原文：After decades overseeing some of Peru’s biggest mines, Victor Gobitz has reemerged at the helm of a Canadian startup that has plans to begin copper production in a year and go public in the medium term.】

item.title: 英特尔因合作传闻而实现历史性周涨幅
item.description: 英特尔公司（Intel Corp. ）股价有望创下有记录以来的最大单周涨幅，原因是该公司与一家主要竞争对手就建立合作伙伴关系进行的讨论尚未得到证实，这为该公司在长期疲软之后扭转颓势带来了希望。【原文：Intel Corp. shares are on track for their biggest one-week gain on record, as unconfirmed discussions about a partnership with a key rival provide hope for a turnaround after an extended period of weakness.】

item.title: Enbridge 首席执行官称北方门户管道计划难以重启
item.description: 恩桥公司（Enbridge Inc.首席执行官格雷格-埃贝尔（Greg Ebel）说，如果不对立法进行重大修改，帮助此类项目在加拿大取得进展，就很难重新启动已被废除的 "北方门户"（Northern Gateway）石油管道提案。【原文：Enbridge Inc. Chief Executive Officer Greg Ebel said it would be difficult to revive the scrapped Northern Gateway oil pipeline proposal without major legislative changes that would help such projects move forward in Canada.】

item.title: 自闭症治疗是美国医疗费用增长最快的项目之一
item.description: 根据周五发表在医学杂志《美国医学会杂志》上的最新分析，治疗自闭症谱系障碍是美国医疗支出增长最快的领域之一。【原文：Treatment of autism spectrum disorders is one of the fastest-growing areas of US health spending, according to new analysis published Friday in medical journal JAMA.】

item.title: Blackstone 的 BXMT 为室外仓储地块贷款 1.89 亿美元
item.description: Blackstone Inc. 的抵押房地产投资信托基金正在为 Alterra Property Group 旗下一个部门拥有的室外工业仓储地块贷款 1.89 亿美元。【原文：Blackstone Inc.’s mortgage real estate investment trust is lending $189 million for outdoor industrial storage lots owned by a division of Alterra Property Group.】

item.title: Blackstone 考虑以 20 亿美元出售天然气勘探公司 Olympus
item.description: 据熟悉此事的人士透露，Blackstone Inc. 正在探索出售 Olympus Energy，这是阿巴拉契亚地区的一家天然气勘探公司，估值可能高达 20 亿美元。【原文：Blackstone Inc. is exploring a sale of Olympus Energy, a natural gas explorer in the Appalachian region that could be valued at up to $2 billion, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Meta 计划对人工智能驱动的仿人机器人进行重大投资
item.description: Meta Platforms 公司在进军增强现实和人工智能领域之后，又确定了下一个大赌注：人工智能驱动的仿人机器人。【原文：Meta Platforms Inc., after pushing into augmented reality and artificial intelligence, has identified its next big bet: AI-powered humanoid robots.】

item.title: Meta 聘请前 RealReal 首席执行官帮助销售智能眼镜
item.description: Meta Platforms 公司聘请了奢侈品市场 The RealReal 公司的前首席执行官，以加强其 Quest 耳机、智能眼镜和其他人工智能可穿戴设备的零售渠道。【原文：Meta Platforms Inc. has hired the former chief executive officer of luxury goods marketplace The RealReal Inc. to boost its retail sales channels for Quest headsets, smart glasses and other artificial intelligence wearables.】

item.title: 加拿大航空公司在贸易战中对冲大部分货币风险
item.description: 加拿大航空公司（Air Canada）表示，已做好准备应对唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统加征关税带来的任何不利因素，其货币对冲计划是该公司战略的重要组成部分。【原文：Air Canada says it’s ready for any headwinds resulting from President Donald Trump’s tariffs, with its currency-hedging program a key part of its strategy.】

item.title: 优步在数百万美元的广告宣传中瞄准人身伤害律师
item.description: 优步科技公司（Uber Technologies Inc. ）正投入数百万美元开展全国性广告活动，以推动保险政策改革，该公司称，保险政策被人身伤害律师利用，导致乘车价格上涨。【原文：Uber Technologies Inc. is pouring millions of dollars into a national ad campaign to push for reforms in insurance policies that it says have been exploited by personal injury lawyers and contribute to higher ride prices.】

item.title: 奇乐通讯：奇趣酒吧小测试
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 泰晤士河水务公司下周将知晓命运，因为资金即将耗尽
item.description: 陷入困境的公用事业公司泰晤士水务公司（Thames Water）将在不到 100 个小时内最终了解自己的未来，因为伦敦的一名法官寄予了任何拯救方案的希望。【原文：Beleaguered utility Thames Water will finally learn its future in less than 100 hours as any hopes for a rescue package rest with a London judge.】

item.title: X 平价贷款是折扣消失的最新例证
item.description: 就在几个月前，银行还在账面上以大幅折扣出售给 X 控股公司的贷款，现在却以面值出售，这凸显了投资者日益增长的担忧：对杠杆贷款的需求如此强劲，以至于价格飞涨。【原文：Loans to X Holdings Corp. that banks had on their books at big discounts just a few months ago are being sold at face value now, underscoring a growing concern for investors: Demand for leveraged loans is so strong that prices are soaring.】

item.title: 特朗普对乌克兰的计划将给欧洲盟国带来 3 万亿美元的负担
item.description:
无论美国总统决定在乌克兰采取何种行动，有一点是明确的：欧洲不准备承担其巨大的负担。【原文：

Sea cual sea el objetivo que el presidente de EE.UU. decida para Ucrania, una cosa está clara: Europa no está preparada para asumir su enorme parte de la carga.

】

item.title: 据说南非更倾向于美国双边贸易协议而非非洲增长和机会法
item.description: 知情人士称，如果美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的政府在两国关系恶化的情况下取消南非对世界最大经济体的优惠准入，南非正准备向美国提出一项双边贸易协定。【原文：South Africa is preparing to pitch a bilateral trade agreement to the US if President Donald Trump’s administration revokes the nation’s preferential access to the world’s biggest economy as relations between them sour, people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 国家税务总局的影响刺痛了以联邦租赁付款为支持的公共债券
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）积极推动取消联邦租约，这给一些由美国政府付款支持的市政债券带来了压力。【原文：Elon Musk’s aggressive push to cancel federal leases is pressuring some municipal bonds backed by payments from the US government.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长诺特警告全球合作终将付出高昂代价
item.description: Klaas Knot 认为，世界经济秩序的分化对经济增长和金融稳定构成了日益严重的威胁。【原文：Fragmentation of the world economic order poses an increasing threat to growth and financial stability, according to Klaas Knot.】

item.title: 德国莱茵金属公司获上调目标，汇丰银行看好消费热潮
item.description: 德国防务公司莱茵金属公司（Rheinmetall AG）的目标股价不断攀升，汇丰控股公司（HSBC Holdings Plc）预期欧洲将掀起一波军费开支浪潮，因此将目标股价提高到了新的纪录。【原文：Price targets for German defense firm Rheinmetall AG are climbing, with HSBC Holdings Plc raising the bar to a new record in anticipation of a wave of European military spending.】

item.title: 中国股票是 Man Group's Cole 最看好的投资品种
item.description: 对 Man Group 的多策略股票主管来说，中国股票是今年最有把握的交易之一，他预计，谷底股价和对中国人工智能创新的重新认识将推动投资反弹。【原文：Chinese stocks are among this year’s highest conviction trades for Man Group’s head of multi-strategy equities, who expects rock-bottom share prices and a fresh appreciation for China’s artificial-intelligence innovations to drive an investment rebound.】

item.title: Tether 表示已获得尤文图斯足球俱乐部的少数股权
item.description: Tether Holdings SA de CV 表示，它已经收购了尤文图斯足球俱乐部（Juventus Football Club SpA）的少数股权，作为加密货币中最有价值的公司之一，它将继续分散其投资组合。【原文：Tether Holdings SA de CV said it’s acquired a minority stake in Juventus Football Club SpA, as one of crypto’s most valuable companies continues to diversify its investment portfolio.】

item.title: 气温降低推动美国工业生产增长
item.description: 美国 1 月份工业生产增幅超过预期，这主要得益于在气温较低的月份里公用事业用量的增加，而机动车产量的大幅下降则抑制了制造业的发展。【原文：US industrial production rose in January by more than forecast, boosted by utilities usage in a month marked by colder temperatures, while a sharp decline in motor vehicle output restrained manufacturing.】
